website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon J3 compact interchageable lens camera is a speedy performer, but it isn't the best in low light, and lacks expansion options when compared with the competition.
cons: Some loss of detail at high ISO settings
No EVF or external flash support

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine from May 2017 until Aug 2018... Then broke. Noticed that happens a lot with the Nikon1 J3 as this was my fourth one I've bought... just bought a new one... packaging already opened and some missing. Not new.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera...Large Hands
customer_reviews.text: Due to its small size I find it a little hard to handle. Maybe best for a person with small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera, almost too compact. I purchased an attachment to make it easier to hold and it makes firmly holding the camera much easier. The only negative comment I have is withg the shutter release. It fits so smoothly in the camera case that I find it difficult to know when by finger is toiuching it. There needs to be a small projection on top of the release so you will know when your finger is in contact with the shutterr release.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this camera for a trip abroad but was worried it would not do everything my D90 does. I was wrong. It did more. Easy to use, easy to carry, a pleasure to shoot with.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chalut

customer_reviews.title: A superb buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for someone very dear to me. Her reaction continues to be overwhelmingly positive. This was the camera that won out over many "brain-picking" sessions that I had with professional photographer friends. Don't wait, BUY ONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best small camera purchase ever...
customer_reviews.text: The camera is efficient all around... Top quality the point and shoot feature gives superb picture quality.... Easy to handle and info is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I get much better photos than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I get much better photos than my old canon. But I truly regret that I should have bought a 10-100mm lens than two lenses. Just few dollars more expensive but much convenience you will enjoy during a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Frankly say

customer_reviews.title: The RED picture SNAPPER
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than the Nikon COOLPIX L830 I bought, that's for damn sure. Now I can actually get photos of my toddler with out an arm or leg or whatever is moving about being blurry.
customer_reviews.author: jasen

customer_reviews.title: but I am very pleased with my Amazon Warehouse Deals purchase
customer_reviews.text: early days, still trying to get to grips with all the features, but I am very pleased with my Amazon Warehouse Deals purchase... super duper good value. Hopefully many happy snapping days are ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Juliebun

customer_reviews.title: but overall camera works great and that was my main concern
customer_reviews.text: It was a used Camera, missing a few parts some mentioned in posting some not, but overall camera works great and that was my main concern.
customer_reviews.author: TKU

customer_reviews.title: Takes very nice photos!
customer_reviews.text: . I'm not a professional photographer but the quality of the photos are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this camera!! It does everything my DSLR does and more!! Great camera for the price. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for above average pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Loreli Foster

customer_reviews.title: it's a winner
customer_reviews.text: with retirement looming, i began seeking out a hobby. i choose photography, someting i enjoyed when younger. knowing my wife would also like to take pictures i purchased a nikon 1 v2 for myself and a nikon 1 j3 for her. I am very happy with both purchases. i love the fact they share lenses. I knew that i wasn't getting the best nikon camera but this is all i needed. Better than a point and shoot but versitle enough to take great travel photos.
customer_reviews.author: dan w

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product... It came highly recommended but I haven't had a chance to personally use. I'm no pro so I relied on word of mouth for my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Meche

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was quick and I'm very satisfied with the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to son and he loves it! Pics re beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon - Name Demands the Price... performance is not comensurate with it
customer_reviews.text: light and easy to use, but quite expensive for the performance
customer_reviews.author: Zhiv

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, not so much the zoom. Yes its lightweight but the lenses get in the way. Going to buy the next lense it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Mahdy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera, big with camera features.
customer_reviews.text: My reason for purchasing this camera, was based somewhat on a suggesting of a photograph friend who uses a version of this camera. Its performance by itself is great, and in low light it shines. Plus with an optional Nikon FT1 mount, you can use your standard Nikon AFS lens with it as well, giving you 2.7 times the reach. Really been impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Lemke

customer_reviews.title: goog quality
customer_reviews.text: What a good camera!That is what I need !!! Finally I can "catch" my babies! Thank you for this very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Wen-Juan Liu

customer_reviews.title: All work excellent, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: All work excellent, no complaints. I been using J1 but J3 the sensor lens work with out issues, is lighter, the ergonomic design is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera!!
customer_reviews.text: it's just a great camera, it works on every enviroment and every light, everday I love it more and more!
customer_reviews.author: magala

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality of hd images
customer_reviews.text: Compact, practical to use. Usefull image settings. Very good quality of hd images.
customer_reviews.author: SERGIO JACOBOVITZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A camera with great capabilities that's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Venjuris

customer_reviews.title: Nikon 1 J3 14.2MP camera with 10-30mm VR 1 NIKKOR Lens (Black)
customer_reviews.text: This Nikon 1 J3 14.2MP camera with 10-30mm VR 1 NIKKOR Lens (Black), great easy to use compact camera, very happy, still learning how to use all features of this camera. I order an extra battery, but have not used camera enough to drain the battery. I was use to my Lumix camera, so there is a learning curve with this Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Milic Bogdanovic

customer_reviews.title: Overall great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall great buy. Produces great photos, has a great feel and touch, the additional lens kit in the package is added benefit. The only things I wish it did have, in case they're important to you are: - Time Lapse setting - More automated settings - Wifi
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: THE CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Everything I Wanted in a small package. The price is decent but overall it was the best present i gave.
customer_reviews.author: phew thao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clean and works perfect! What a GREAT deal I got!
customer_reviews.author: Aly Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is AMAZING! its light and small enough to put in my bag when i'm on the run or climbing. Having the two zoom lenses makes for incredible range and changing them easy. the in camera edits are awesome. it takes some getting used to but i love my camera and the quality of photos it takes. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cavaliere

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It does everything that I want and more. Great photos! My only 'complaint' is the lack of wireless transfer but the purchase of an Eye-Fi SD card handled that no problem. I got a great product at a great price and could not be happier with this Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: GREAT camera to go alongside my Nikon DSLR
customer_reviews.text: GREAT camera to go alongside my Nikon DSLR. It's my wife's go to for picture taking and she hasn't taken a bad shot yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: The camera is exactly what my wife was looking for. It looks great and functionality is superb. Best christmas ever!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Yocom

customer_reviews.title: you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and easy to use. I have a Nikon digital SLR D3200, and I use the Nikon 1 J3 alot more. Dont get me wrong...the full DSLR 3200 is a better camera for the professional photographer, but for my every day needs, I use the Nikon 1 J3. I bought the all white model, and whenever I pull it out, everyone wants to take a look at it. It takes a little getting used to the front heavy aspect, when you have a Nikkor 100mm lens attached, but I got used to it pretty fast and take this camera with me every where.
customer_reviews.author: Chili POP

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Love Love the camera please read all the reviews it is great in low light and in bright. It lost stars because it came packed so poorly was surprised it wasn't damaged. It also dropped $28 and seller said I could send it back at my expense and get another. Will never use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: SlickDealer

customer_reviews.title: Only the first day
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for the excellent photo quality,usability, lightness of the camera and ease of interchanging lenses. I am by no means a professional photographer but decided to step up the quality of photos from my old point and shoot digital camera. After taking a variety of photos and video with this camera over the course of an hour or so the quality of both are incredible and I found the camera very simple to use. It does have a steep price tag but for me it is an excellent camera! I will miss the gps capabilities of my old camera, but the higher quality pics make the trade off worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes the most beautiful, clear pictures even in low light. Easy to use and lightweight. Great Christmas gift for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera - great lens
customer_reviews.text: The only thing missing is a view finder, but the cameras I considered with view finders were three times as expensive. The camera does everything I want. I wanted a fairly automatic camera - this camera has all the functions I think I need.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Man

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: takes great action shots, is very handy and compact extra lenses has been great for all action shots clear and vivid
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been great. It's easy to use and takes fantastic pictures and videos. It's super light and great for travel as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Clark

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did my homework before I got it. (checked reviews on blogs, watched reviews on youtube) all the pro's and con's were there.
customer_reviews.author: Taka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, it was great. Shipped 2 weeks before it's eta. Great shape, brand new. Perfect! You will enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera, and came earlier then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera as a gift - came early and in one piece. Great device - very compact and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J. Jansepar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful step up from my point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a trip out west and brought back over 500 high quality photos from our vacation. The camera is extremely easy to use and the interchangeable lenses provides options usually only achieved with the larger SLR. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: June Slusser

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this camera
customer_reviews.text: One of my best memories is that God allowed me to be in a position a few years ago to buy my beautiful daughter over 12,000 dollars worth of Canon equipment (EOS 5D and top notch lenses) which she really likes. She likes this little Nikon just as much but for different reasons. I don't think you can go wrong with the Nikon 1 J3 as an "almost" pro-sumer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this the day before we left for vacation. Easy to use and takes great pictures. Very happy I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Karleen Junglov

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera! However the picture quality is no match to a SLR camera.I love the zoom lens! It needs a very good image stabilizer though. The pictures on a tripod with the zoom are better.
customer_reviews.author: Shaiza I. Khan

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures easy to use just the right size for my Daughter to use. She loves it. very well made
customer_reviews.author: Wetpaws

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes really good pictures. Can look kind of weird with some of the bigger lenses but the quality of the camera surpasses my point and shoot. I'm an amateur photographer so it suits me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Superfast autofocus
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 young children and wanted a camera that shot pictures that could be framed around the house not just posted online. We can capture moments that were previously just missed. We plants get the pancake lens for summertime pocket carrying. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jake White

customer_reviews.title: Camera gets hot and shuts down after just 30 minutes of video.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, very strange, but during our family summer vacation 2013 using this brand new Nikon 1 J3, while taking video, the bottom part of the camera got extremely HOT until the point where it shut down, and had to wait (10-15 mins) until it came back up. The quality of the photos, usability, weight, battery time, etc. are very very good (coming from a Canon guy). That's why 3 stars only.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: No viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cameras on the market that has all the right stuff- except for a viewfinder which makes it VERY difficult to see the image your taking a photo of especially if its sunny outside.Otherwise you will love the video and photo quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Photographer

customer_reviews.title: neat but not great
customer_reviews.text: The camera did some really neat things and was very fast, but the picture quality was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner's camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I am just a beginner photographer, meaning I have taken no classes and I love learning how the different functions on the camera work! Great Camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie L. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I keep this camera in my bag because I use it on a daily basis. It's easy to use, the batteries last very long and lightweight. The shutter speed is just a bit slow so there's a delay when taking pictures. Pictures turn out very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Cadavona

customer_reviews.title: Compact with big performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I am on my travels and I simply can't take the DSLR due to lack of space. The auto focus is very good, takes great pictures and is simple to use with manual control when required.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Trueman

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: it feels like i wasted my money on buying the j3. sure it has good features and everything but i could have gotten those features with a different camera at a cheaper price or with more features with the same price. they marked down the prices which makes me feel more of a sucker.
customer_reviews.author: machinistmate

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Does not alwaysd focus on the subject you want it to. Can't see the viewfinder in bright sunlight (basically any time you're outside on a sunny day).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H. Mullen

product_meta.title: Nikon 1 J3 14.2 MP HD Digital Camera with 10-30mm VR 1 NIKKOR Lens (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style:with 10-30mm VR 1 NIKKOR LensFROM THE MANUFACTURER



Big inspiration and performance in a beautiful little package.
Ignite your creativity with some of the most stunning images you've ever shot. The 14.2-megapixel Nikon 1 J3 brings your vision to life as exceptional photos, HD videos and Motion Snapshots that will have you capturing more moments than ever. Beautifully designed, remarkably simple and faster than any camera you've ever experienced, the Nikon 1 J3 will become the centerpiece of your creative expression and an endless source of inspiration.








CREATE AT THE SPEED OF LIFE
HARNESS THE REMARKABLE SPEED AND PRECISION OF NIKON 1
The first thing you'll notice about your Nikon 1 J3 is its extraordinary speed. The LCD display has absolutely no lag. That means you can frame shots faster, pan faster, zoom faster—do everything faster. The Hybrid AF System is the fastest in the world*, so your images will be crystal clear, whether you're shooting a soaring bird or a fidgety child. The shutter fires at a blazing speed—up to 15 shots per second continuously—so you can freeze even the fastest moving subjects.
*Among digital cameras with interchangeable lenses available as of June 1, 2012; based on Nikon research.

CONQUER FLEETING MOMENTS
SO MANY WAYS TO CATCH THE MOMENTS THAT MATTER
The best moments are made (and missed) in an instant. But imagine being able to slow down an important moment—to see live action in slow motion. With the Nikon 1 J3 camera's amazing Slow View mode, that's exactly what happens. Slow down what you're seeing on the LCD, then select the shot you want. Combine that with Smart Photo Selector, which fires 20 shots with a single shutter press and selects the best five for you, and you've got every advantage for catching those once-in-a-lifetime moments.

GO BEYOND THE STILL PHOTO
ADD STUNNING HD VIDEOS TO YOUR ARSENAL OF EXPRESSION
Your creativity isn't limited to still photos with the Nikon 1 J3. A single press of a button and you'll be recording in dazzling Full HD 1080p video with stereo sound. See something that would make a great still image while you're recording? Simultaneously shoot full-resolution photos without missing a beat. Get the best of both worlds.



SHARE YOUR CREATIONS ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
WIRELESS SHARING TO YOUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
Your friends and family will love seeing your creations, and with the NIkon 1 J3, you'll never have to wait to share them. Add Nikon's WU-1b Wireless Mobile Adapter (sold separately), and instantly transfer your photos, videos or Motion Snapshots to your smartphone, tablet or compatible Wi-Fi(R) enabled device. Then share them as usual—by email, text message or by uploading them to your favorite photo-sharing website. It couldn't be easier!





PREMIUM ACCESSORIES
WU-1b Wireless Mobile Adapter 

Using the WU-1b optional wireless mobile adapter you can now automatically send great images to your smartphone and even use your smartphone to remotely capture images from your Nikon 1 J3. With an easy to use app, now when you can't wait to share that great shot you don't have to. Share it to your smartphone in a instant. EN-EL20 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery

These rechargeable batteries provide extended life and consistent power, even in colder conditions.

FT-1 F-Mount Adapter 

Use certain legacy F mount NIKKOR lenses on your Nikon 1 J3 with the FT-1 adapter.
feature_bullets: 14.2 MP super high-speed AF CMOS Sensor
Wi-Fi Connectivity with WU-1b adapter (not included)
Best Moment Capture - view live images in slow motion

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars91 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
